title: DOWNTOWN KIRKLAND - LAUNDRY ENSUITE - HUGE BACKYARD
posting_body: Conveniently situated with easy access to shopping, restaurants, nightlife,
waterfront, Lake Washington beaches, tennis and parks.
1 bedroom - townhouse style unit with private separate entrance 900+/- sq ft.
No common hallways, walk straight into your new home.
Wood burning FIREPLACE and all appliances including:
This well maintained triplex has a HUGE GRASS BACKYARD with 2 reserved parking spots
Bring your house size furniture very spacious layout.
Quick and easy access to Microsoft, downtown Bellevue and walk to Google.
Kirkland Urban and main Kirkland bus terminal 2 blocks away.
Enjoy all downtown Kirkland has to offer in this upscale neighborhood.
IF INTERESTED, please reply here and tell us a bit about you (ie. where moving from and
working, how long at both, when looking to move, when available to view, any pets, etc.).
